runs.comm: good length ball on the off stump. He comes forward and defends it back onto the pitch
fuller length ball outside the off stump. Swart comes down the track and looks to defend it. He is beaten by the movement and is squared up
comes down the track and looks to turn it to square-leg. The Inward movement beats the flick and they run a leg-bye instead
now there is some juice on the pitch. Masharafe is looking to exploit it. Barresi looks to defend it and is beaten by the away movement
and that's the first blood. Short of a good length delivery that Barresi looks to pull. he misjudges the length and the ball hits the top of off.
comes forward and pushes it to mid-on
fuller ball on the off stump. Swart comes down the track in an attempt to loft it away on the leg side. He gets a leading edge to sweeper cover for a couple
and another edge! This time it's the inside edge as Swart looks to pull a ball outside the off stump and beats the keeper who is standing up
comes forward and pushes it to cover point for a single
fuller ball on the middle stump. Cooper stands tall and drives it to long-on for a single
fuller ball outside the off stump. Swart comes forward and drives it to extra-cover- his first confident stroke
comes forward and pushes it to cover for a single
wide down the leg stump line
good length ball on the leg stump. Swart pushes it to short fine-leg and takes a quick single

now that's the wicket Bangladesh wanted. It was a fuller ball on the leg stump. Cooper looks to exploit the short boundary at the cow corner. He ends lofting it straight into the hands of Shakib. No celebrations for the wicket. They are still recuperating from the loss yesterday
comes forward and defends it to cover
good length ball on the leg stump. Swart pushes it to square-leg for a single
fuller ball outside the off stump. He comes forward and defends it to cover point
off the outside edge to short third-man for a single. Mashrafe appealed for LBW there, but the umpire had nothing to do with it
comes forward and defends it back to the bowler
fuller ball on the middle stump. Szwarczynski comes down the track and lofts it into waiting hands of Ziaur Rahman at mid-on
off the pads to cover
pushes it to square-leg
comes down the track and lofts it to long-on for a boundary. He needs to play a captain's innings here
off the pads to square-leg for a leg-bye
off the thigh pad to the point fielder for a leg-bye
good length on the off stump. Swart comes forward and defends it to the leg side
turns it behind square for a single
short ball outside the off stump. Borren looks to cut it and is beaten the late movement. Mashrafe was impressive yesterday too and is continuing the good job today
comes forward and defends the good length back onto the pitch
good length ball on the middle stump and going down the leg side line. Borren runs a leg-bye as the ball trickles to point
pulls it to deep midwicket for a boundary
comes down the track and lofts it over long-on for a six
pushes it to midwicket and runs a quick single
looks to sweep and is beaten by the turn
flighted ball on the middle stump. Borren defends it back onto the pitch
cuts it to deep point for a single
flicks it to deep midwicket for a couple
slower and shorter ball on the leg stump line. Even a fifth grade could have dispatched it. Swart   does the same as he pulls it to backward square-leg for a boundary
short ball outside the off stump. Swart pulls it to deep midwicket for a single
nothing is going Nazmul's way. He bowls a peach of a delivery outside the off stump. Borren comes forward looking to defend and gets an outside edge to third-man for a boundary
comes forward and defends it to  the off side for a single
comes forward and turns it to midwicket  for a single
turns it to short fine-leg for a single
Borren comes down the track and pushes it to depe midwicket for a single
a stumping chance ! Swart comes down the track in an attempt to loft it away and got an edge. Rahim can't collect the ball as he misses the stumping
looks to reverse sweep and gets the ball to point. the point fielder throws the ball back to Rahim who whips the bails off. Needless piece of running there
comes forward and defends it back to the bowler
drives it to cover
pushes it to midwicket for a single
looks to cut it and is beaten by the turn
fuller ball on the leg stump. He flicks it to deep midwicket for a single
waits a touch longer and plays it with the turn . He late-cuts it to third-man for a couple
turns it to deep midwicket for a single
on the leg stump. He turns it to fine-leg for a single
comes forward and defends it to the leg side
comes down the track and pushes it to midwicket for a single

comes down the track and lofts it to long-on. Mashrafe, for a moment, thought he was in with a chance to take the catch, but dived a touch early and drops it. It is called a boundary after a discussion between the umpires
sweeps it to deep square-leg for a single
comes forward and defends it back onto the pitch
employing the sweep to good effect as he sweeps it to short fine-leg for a single
short ball outside the off stump. He makes room to cut it to deep point and runs hard to take a couple
moves back and late-cuts it to third-man boundary
pushes it to midwicket for a single
flighted ball on the leg stump. Swart comes down the track and lofts it over long-on for a six. What's more, he brings up his half-century with that stroke
sweeps it to short fine-leg for a single
good length ball on the leg stump. de Grooth  pushes it to deep square-leg for a couple
pushes it to point for a single
fuller ball on the leg stump. de Grooth paddles it to short fine-leg for a single
fuller ball on the off stump. Looks to pull it and is beaten
turns it to midwicket for a single
lofts it  inside-out to sweeper cover for a couple
fuller ball on the off stump. de Grooth reverse paddles it over short third-man for a boundary. Second boundary for him
slower ball outside the off stump. de Grooth guides it  to short third-man for a single
that's a superb catch by Abdur Razzak! de Groot comes down the track and lofts it to wide long-off. Razzak runs to his left and dives. He manages to wrap his hands and take a superb catch
flattish ball on the leg stump. Swart sweeps it to square-leg for a single
fuller ball on the middle stump. Bukhari makes room and slaps it to long-on for a single
pushes it to the leg side for a single
flighted ball outside the off stump. Bukhari looks to defend it and is beaten. So is Rahim They run across for a bye
wide down the leg side
pushes it to cover for a single and brings the hundred up
pulls it to leg side
comes forward and drives it to mid-off
off the pads to  short third-man for a leg-bye
Swart is gone! Fuller ball outside the off stump. He moves across and lofts it straight it into the hands of Nasir Hossain at deep midwicket
comes forward and drives it back to the bowler
fuller ball outside the off stump. He cuts it tot he point fielder
pushes it to vacant midwicket region for a single
full-toss on the off stump. Bukhari comes forward and drives it to long-off for a single
comes forward and drives back a full-toss to the bowler
cuts it to point and takes a single
short ball on the off stump. He pulls it to deep midwicket for a single
comes forward and lofts it to sweeper cover for a single
cuts it past the backward point fielder for a boundary
full-toss on the leg stump. Bukhari forces it to long-on for a single
comes forward and drives it to extra-cover for a single
spears it into the leg stump. He makes room and drives it to cover for a single

fuller ball and wide outside the off stump. He spots the batsman coming down and spears it outside off. Bukhari looks to drive and gets a top edge to short third-man. Junaid takes the catch by diving forward
well the pace on the ball is progressively increasing. He spears it onto the pads. Seelaar makes room and drives it to cover for a single
drives it to sweeper cover for a single
plays it with soft-hands to midwicket. They run like hares to take a couple. There is an appeal for run-out too but the replays show that the batsman was in
Seelaar is beaten by a leg-cutter outside the off stump. Good start to the over by Mashrafe
fuller ball on the off stump. Seelaar makes room and lofts it to long-off where Shaki dives and can't get his hands on it. Ball sails over the ropes to the collective delight of the spectators there
square-drives it to point for a single
fuller ball on the off stump. Gruijters lofts it over the bowler's head for a boundary
full-toss on the leg stump. Gruijters turns it to midwicket and takes a couple
short ball outside the off stump. Gruijters looks to pull it and gets a top-edge to fine-leg boundary. 17 runs off the over. Spoiling Mashrafe's figures a bit, that over
